mapper.insert: insert into dispatch_plan_batch (id, user_id, `name`, status_show, status_notify, times, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{statusNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{times,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dispatch_plan_batch set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_show = #{statusShow,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status_notify = #{statusNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, times = #{times,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, `name`, status_show, status_notify, times, gmt_create, gmt_modified from dispatch_plan_batch
